page.title: 14MIDDLETON'S LANGLEY FESTIVAL
page.content: Langley festival has been going on for 10 years. So it is it's tenth anniversary this year. It is a family event so everyone is out and about. It usually takes place during the first two weeks in July. Everyone can join in at any age. For instance for the very young ones there's a Bonny Baby Show. There's a Punch & Judy show at a local play group for the boys and girls there. Local schools are being visited by famous authors. For teenagers to get them off the streets is a disco and a breakdancing competition for anyone interested. For the adults a folk evening. There are lots of sports like Judo displays, Gym displays and for footballers a football match with Middleton Police and Langley Rangers. On the last day there is a fair and a parade with the Mayor and the Mayoress around Langley.
